original_title: 张震讲故事之洗脸女生的传说
overview: The radio series Chang Chen Ghost Stories was first launched in 1999 by anchor Zhang Zhen, and it has become the most successful horror radio program to date in China. "The Legend of the Girl Who Washed Her Face" is another creepy tale from this collection.
title: Zhang Zhen's Ghost Stories: The Girl Who Washed Her Face
